h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Head through this area either taking the low path to the left, or check the upper path on the right where many Frozen Corpses have gathered around a Tree Pearl you can harvest.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Outside the Wheel'.
The content is as follows:
Head through this area either taking the low path to the left, or check the upper path on the right where many Frozen Corpses have gathered around a Tree Pearl you can harvest.
